column4: Hello.  Am looking for some assistance with unpacking and installing a tar.bz2 for my new wireless adapter

To be more specific I am installing a Alfa AWUS036NH wireless adapter.  I have blacklisted my integrated drivers which has me to where I am no longer being able to connect wifi.  I have attempted to unpack 2 seperate tar.bz2 files and execute make.  But when I execute make I get an error =/
